law.catch_line: Report of license or certificate suspension, revocation, or limitation.
law.text: Any provider licensed or certified under the laws of the Commonwealth whose license or certificate to practice is suspended, revoked, limited, or otherwise restricted shall have that fact reported to the medical assistance program by the respective licensure or regulatory board or agency within five (5) working days of the action.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 96, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1994; and ch. 316, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1994.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/94). This statute was enacted by identical sections in two bills (1994 Ky. Acts chs. 96 & 316) which have been codified together.
